about_the_game:
WELCOME MORANA

Age: Unknown

Zodiac Sign: Virgo

Preferences: Chess, books, cowgirl position, breast play during sex.

Morana is a calm and confident woman, rarely losing her temper but easily moved by emotions. She has a romantic nature, often lost in daydreams, though her vast life experience and the hardships she's endured have taught her to stay grounded. She values solitude but can't live without people — she needs someone to care for, someone to shower with affection and passion.

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING

From now on, Morana will become not only your calming companion but also your passionate muse! She will always keep you company on the main screen with her graceful animations and captivating dialogues.

By purchasing this DLC, you get the Morana mascot! You can switch your mascot at any time by opening your profile and choosing the "Mascot" tab.

Along with the mascot, you're getting 5000 credits and 150 super serum.

But most importantly, you're getting our undying gratitude! Thank you for considering purchasing this DLC!

content_descriptors.notes: All characters in the game are over 20 years old. This DLC contains explicit adult themes, including nudity and sexual acts. Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.

name: Lust Goddess — Mascot Morana
short_description: Unlock a unique mascot, Morana, to entertain you every time you visit the main screen! Enjoy Lust Goddess with this super sidekick and some extra resources to boost your progress.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
